hero.title: X Profile Menu
hero.subtitle: Chrome Browser Extension
hero.description: Make Twitter browsing easier. Hover to show quick menu, left-click for direct access, right-click for mini-window preview without losing your current page position.

leftClick.title: Left-Click Direct Access
leftClick.description: Click menu items to jump directly to the page, quickly view user's posts, replies, media and other content.

rightClick.title: Right-Click Mini-Window
rightClick.description: Right-click to open a mini-window preview on current page. The mini-window remembers its position, and the main page stays where it was.

stateKeeping.title: üåü Remember Where You Were
stateKeeping.description: Mini-windows remember where you were reading. Close and reopen to find the same spot. Main page position stays unchanged too, so you can browse multiple things at once.

features.title: Revolutionary Feature Experience
features.subtitle: Five core feature characteristics, carefully designed to enhance your X.com experience, making every interaction smarter and more efficient

hoverMenu.title: Hover Shortcut Menu
hoverMenu.description: Hover over any Profile button to instantly display an intelligent quick access menu, including Posts, Replies, Highlights, Articles, Media, Likes options.
hoverMenu.demo: Menu automatically appears 0.3 seconds after hovering, supports ESC key for quick close

dualMode.title: Dual Click Access Mode
dualMode.description: Left-click menu items to directly jump to corresponding pages, right-click to open iframe preview in current page, flexibly meeting different usage needs.
dualMode.demo: Left-click: open in new tab, Right-click: iframe popup preview in current page

openSource.title: Open Source Transparency
openSource.description: Completely open source project, welcoming community contributions and improvements. You can view source code, submit issues, and participate in development on GitHub.
openSource.demo: MIT open source license, supports Fork, Star, PR contributions, active developer community

privacy.title: Privacy Security
privacy.description: Follows Chrome extension security standards, collects no personal data, all operations completed locally, ensuring your privacy and data security.
privacy.demo: Zero data collection, local processing, passed Chrome Web Store security review

lightweight.title: Lightweight Efficiency
lightweight.description: Uses minimal system resources, fast response speed, startup time under 100ms, won't affect browser performance and normal usage experience.
lightweight.demo: Memory usage < 5MB, CPU usage < 1%, supports browser hardware acceleration

demo.title: Extension Demo
demo.subtitle: See how X Profile Menu simplifies your social media experience

step1.title: Hover Activation
step1.description: Hover mouse over any Profile button to automatically display shortcut menu

step2.title: Left-click Direct Access
step2.description: Left-click menu items (Posts, Replies, Media, etc.) to directly jump to pages

step3.title: Right-click Preview
step3.description: Right-click menu items to open iframe preview in current page without leaving current environment

demo.imageAlt1: X Profile Menu hover menu demo
demo.imageAlt2: X Profile Menu iframe preview demo
demo.imageCaption: üí° Real extension demo screenshots - hover menu and iframe preview features

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me and share your thoughts and suggestions. I highly value every user's feedback, let's make this extension better together

email.title: Email Contact
email.description: For any questions or suggestions, feel free to email me anytime. I will reply to your message as soon as possible.

twitter.title: Follow My X
twitter.description: Get latest updates and technical sharing, learn about the stories and technical details behind extension development.

github.title: View Source Code
github.description: Completely open source project, welcoming community contributions and improvements. View code, submit PRs, let's make the project better together.

donation.title: Support Me
donation.message: If this extension is helpful to you, welcome to support my development work through the following ways!
donation.copyTip: üí° Click the right button to copy address to clipboard
donation.thankYouMessage: Your donation will help me continuously improve and maintain this project, providing better experience for more users. Every support is my motivation to move forward!

download.title: Start Using Now
download.subtitle: Download X Profile Menu for free to enhance your X.com experience
download.chromeStoreDesc: Official channel, safe and reliable, automatic updates

installGuide.title: Installation Guide
installGuide.description: Extension has been published on Chrome Web Store (version {version}). After installation, please refresh the browser on X.com page, then hover mouse over any Profile button to experience the smart shortcut menu.

footer.description: Simplify your X.com social media experience, one-click access to personal profile pages.
footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 X Profile Menu. All rights reserved.

metadata.title: X Profile Menu - Chrome Browser Extension
metadata.description: Quickly hover over the Profile button on any Twitter page to pop up a quick access menu. Left-click for direct access to Posts, Replies, Highlights, Articles, Media, Likes, right-click to open iframe preview.
metadata.shortDescription: Quickly hover over the Profile button on any Twitter page to pop up a quick access menu. Left-click for direct access to Posts, Replies, Highlights, Articles, Media, right-click to open iframe preview.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy for X Profile Menu

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to X Profile Menu, a Chrome browser extension that enhances your X.com (formerly Twitter) browsing experience. At X Profile Menu, your privacy is of utmost importance to me, and this privacy policy outlines how I collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use my browser extension.

dataCollection.title: Information Collection and Use
dataCollection.content: I am committed to protecting your privacy. My extension operates with the following data practices:

noDataCollection.title: No Personal Data Collection
noDataCollection.content: X Profile Menu does not collect, store, or transmit any personal information. The extension operates entirely within your browser and does not communicate with external servers except for the websites you choose to visit.

localOperation.title: Local Operation Only
localOperation.content: All extension functionality is performed locally in your browser. When you use our hover menu features, all operations are processed within your device and browser environment.

websiteInteraction.title: Website Interaction
websiteInteraction.content: The extension only interacts with X.com pages to provide enhanced menu functionality. It does not modify, collect, or store any content from these pages.

permissions.title: Browser Permissions
permissions.content: My extension requests minimal permissions necessary for functionality:
list: Active tab access: To display hover menus on X.com pages
Host permissions for x.com: To enable extension functionality on the target website

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content: X Profile Menu does not integrate with or share data with any third-party analytics services, advertising networks, or data brokers.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Since we do not collect any personal data, there is no data retention policy needed. Any temporary data used for extension functionality is immediately discarded after use.

security.title: Security
security.content: I implement security best practices in my extension development, including following Chrome Extension Manifest V3 security standards. All code is open source and available for public review on GitHub.

updates.title: Changes to This Policy
updates.content: I may update this privacy policy from time to time. I will notify users of any changes by posting the new policy on my website and updating the "Last Updated" date. Continued use of the extension after changes constitutes acceptance of the new policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or my data practices, please contact me through my GitHub repository.

consent.content: By using X Profile Menu, you consent to this privacy policy and agree to its terms. Thank you for trusting me with your browsing experience!

terms.title: Terms of Service for X Profile Menu

introduction.title: Introduction and Acceptance of Terms
introduction.content: Welcome to X Profile Menu, a Chrome browser extension that enhances your X.com (formerly Twitter) browsing experience. By installing or using my extension, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any of these terms, please do not use my extension.

useOfService.title: Use of the Extension
useOfService.content: X Profile Menu provides users with enhanced navigation tools for X.com, including hover menus for quick access to user profiles and content. You agree to use the extension in accordance with all applicable local, state, national, and international laws and regulations.

noAccount.title: No Account Required
noAccount.content: X Profile Menu does not require account creation or registration. The extension operates entirely within your browser without collecting personal information or requiring login credentials.

intellectualProperty.title: Content and Intellectual Property Rights
intellectualProperty.content: All content and technology provided through X Profile Menu, including but not limited to the extension code, user interface, and documentation, is protected under copyright law. The extension is open source and available under the MIT license.
details: You acknowledge that the extension code is open source and available for review on GitHub
You may not redistribute or sell the extension outside of official channels
The X Profile Menu name and branding remain my intellectual property
You retain full ownership of your browsing data and activities

prohibitedActivities.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibitedActivities.content: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities while using X Profile Menu:
list: Reverse engineering the extension for malicious purposes
Attempting to bypass or disable extension security features
Using the extension to violate X.com's terms of service
Modifying the extension code to harm other users or systems
Using the extension for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
Interfering with the normal operation of X.com or other users' experiences

privacy.title: Privacy and Data Collection
privacy.content: X Profile Menu is designed with privacy in mind:
details: No personal data collection or storage
No external server communication except for X.com
All functionality operates locally in your browser
No tracking, analytics, or user behavior monitoring
privacy.reference: For detailed privacy information, please refer to my separate Privacy Policy.

freeService.title: Free Service
freeService.content: X Profile Menu is provided as a free service with no charges, subscriptions, or premium features. The extension will remain free to use for all users.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: You may stop using X Profile Menu at any time by uninstalling the extension from your browser. I reserve the right to discontinue the extension or its features with reasonable notice to users through official channels.

warranties.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
warranties.content: The extension is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. I make no warranties or representations about the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the extension and disclaim all warranties to the fullest extent permitted by law.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the fullest extent permitted by law, I shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use of or inability to use the extension, including but not limited to damages related to browsing experience, data loss, or service interruptions.

indemnification.title: Indemnification
indemnification.content: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless the developer of X Profile Menu from any claims, damages, losses, liabilities, and expenses (including attorneys' fees) arising from your use of the extension, violation of these Terms, or misuse of the extension's features.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
governingLaw.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable international laws for open source software. Any disputes arising from these Terms or the extension will be resolved through good faith discussion and, if necessary, appropriate legal channels.

changes.title: Changes to These Terms
changes.content: I reserve the right to update or modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on my website. Your continued use of the extension after any changes signifies your acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact me through my GitHub repository or email.

acceptance.content: By using X Profile Menu, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. Thank you for choosing X Profile Menu for your X.com browsing enhancement!
